revised_title: Optical Multistability and Zeeman Degenerate Transitions in Atomic Systems
tldr: This article explores the behavior of atoms interacting with radiation modes in a cavity, focusing on optical multistability and Zeeman degenerate transitions. The authors examine the system behavior of atoms with specific angular momenta interacting resonantly in a ring cavity with radiation modes. They discuss the mean field solutions for these systems and the impact of ground-level collision rates on the development of asymmetry between output and fields.
